name: Indigo Dragon Run
description:
Indigo Dragon Run is a dynamic runner about the adventures of a brave little Dragon overcoming all kinds of magic obstacles. The game is fun to play at any age – just start playing and you’ll find it hard to stop running up tricky levels with increasing speed, jumping higher than the clouds and sliding down the rainbow!

Game process

Do you want to help the Dragon get the best score and move on to a higher level? Then follow the stars! Make the Dragon leap up and up from one cloud platform to another. Delicious berries will give our hero a great superpower - the ability to fly! Now he can reach the rainbow and slide down from it, which means gobbling up a massive amount of magic berries!

The game is loaded with adventures and entertainment. There are hidden dragon eggs to be found and newborn baby dragons to be rescued. The Dragon can aptly land on top of a monster, or jump on him powerfully to make him blow up. He can seize a magnet that attracts stars, bounce up on a trampoline mushroom, and get a bunch of other bonuses.

While chasing the stars, beware of the dangerous traps set by an angry Troll. And when you put together beautiful puzzles drawn by the best Russian artists, you’ll have a set of pictures telling the story of the Dragon’s and his friend little Wizard’s adventures in the three kingdoms!
